statements: SELECT * FROM GreenhouseEnvironment;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM GreenhouseEnvironment WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM GreenhouseEnvironment WHERE humidity < 60;
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM GreenhouseEnvironment ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM GreenhouseEnvironment;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM GreenhouseEnvironment WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM GreenhouseEnvironment;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM GreenhouseEnvironment WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT * FROM GreenhouseEnvironment WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT id, timestamp FROM GreenhouseEnvironment WHERE temperature >= 20 AND humidity <= 70 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_environment_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT id, temperature FROM greenhouse_environment_data WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT plant_id, growth_stage FROM plant_growth_data WHERE growth_rate > 0.5
SELECT id, time, temperature FROM greenhouse_environment_data WHERE humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 70
SELECT * FROM plant_growth_data ORDER BY growth_rate
SELECT id, time, temperature, humidity FROM greenhouse_environment_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, time, temperature, humidity FROM greenhouse_environment_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY time LIMIT 5
SELECT id, time, temperature, humidity FROM greenhouse_environment_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity >= 60 ORDER BY time ASC
SELECT id, time, temperature, humidity FROM greenhouse_environment_data WHERE temperature < 18 OR humidity > 70 ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC
SELECT id, time, temperature, humidity FROM greenhouse_environment_data WHERE temperature = 26 OR humidity = 55 ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_environment;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM greenhouse_environment ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, date FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT plant_name, optimal_temperature FROM plant_data WHERE plant_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY optimal_temperature ASC;
SELECT MAX(temperature), MIN(humidity) FROM sensor_data;
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_environment WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT plant_name, optimal_temperature, optimal_humidity FROM plant_data WHERE plant_type='Flower' ORDER BY plant_name;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY sensor_id, date ASC;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM greenhouse_environment WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY temperature DESC, date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity > 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Greenhouse
SELECT PlantName, PlantType FROM Plant WHERE PlantType = 'Vegetable'
SELECT SensorLocation, Status FROM Sensor ORDER BY SensorLocation DESC
SELECT SUM(Temperature), AVG(Humidity) FROM Greenhouse
SELECT EventDescription, EventTime FROM Event WHERE EventType = 'Watering'
SELECT Temperature, Humidity, Date FROM Greenhouse WHERE Temperature > 25 AND Humidity < 70 ORDER BY Date DESC;
SELECT PlantName, PlantType FROM Plant WHERE PlantType = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY PlantName ASC;
SELECT SensorType, SensorLocation, Status FROM Sensor WHERE Status = TRUE ORDER BY SensorLocation;
SELECT EventType, EventDescription FROM Event WHERE EventType = 'Watering' ORDER BY EventTime ASC;
SELECT ID, Temperature FROM Greenhouse WHERE Temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY ID DESC;
SELECT * FROM Greenhouse WHERE location = 'Garden City';
SELECT name, location FROM Greenhouse ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM TemperatureData WHERE recorded_at > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Plant WHERE optimal_temperature >= 25 AND optimal_humidity <= 70;
SELECT s.location, t.humidity FROM Sensor s INNER JOIN HumidityData t ON s.greenhouse_id = t.greenhouse_id WHERE t.recorded_at > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY t.humidity DESC;
SELECT * FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY recorded_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT Greenhouse.name, Plant.name, TemperatureData.temperature FROM Greenhouse JOIN Plant ON Greenhouse.id = Plant.greenhouse_id JOIN TemperatureData ON Greenhouse.id = TemperatureData.greenhouse_id
SELECT location, AVG(humidity) AS average_humidity FROM HumidityData GROUP BY location ORDER BY average_humidity DESC
SELECT S.location, T.temperature FROM Sensor AS S JOIN TemperatureData AS T ON S.greenhouse_id = T.greenhouse_id WHERE T.temperature < 20

SELECT P.name, P.optimal_temperature, T.temperature, H.humidity FROM Plant AS P JOIN TemperatureData AS T ON P.greenhouse_id = T.greenhouse_id JOIN HumidityData AS H ON P.greenhouse_id = H.greenhouse_id
